titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 201 B Street in Perryville, Arkansas, as the "Harold George Bennett Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/25/2015--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 201 B Street in Perryville, Arkansas, as the "Harold George Bennett Post Office."
